main.Query:
Declare @vchSQL varchar(8000) Declare @bigsql varchar(8000)
set @vchSQL = 'use [' + @DBName + '] IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.views WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID(N''[dbo].[View_FactConsolidation]'')) DROP VIEW [dbo].[View_FactConsolidation] ' exec (@vchSQL)
set @vchSQL ='CREATE VIEW [dbo].[View_FactConsolidation] AS Select Distinct FC.DimPoolId , FC.LTVPassNo , FC.DimConsolidationID As DimId , FC.ConsolidationLTV * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedLTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning * FC.ConsolidationBalance As WeightedSeasoning , FC.ConsolidationBalance As BalanceAmount , FC.ConsolidationLTV As LTV , FC.ConsolidationSeasoning As Seasoning , Case When FC.ConsolidationDimTrustID > 0 Then 1 Else 0 End As IsIgnore , ConsolidationScrubbedLoanFlag As ScrubbedFlag , ConsolidationPaymentTypeCode AS PaymentTypeCode From dbo.tblFactConsolidation FC ' SET @BigSQL = 'USE [' + @DBName + ']; EXEC sp_executesql N''' + @vchSQL + ''''; --PRINT @BigSQL EXEC (@BigSQL)
